Posts.Content: Hi I understand how denosumab works but having had a normal dexa scan this week,was surprised to still be encouraged to have this drug????? Am told it braks the circle of destruction within the bone.......................... am wondering at what cost?
Posts.Title: denosomab for bone mets

Posts.Content: Hi is there any one who has personal experience of havong this drug monthly for bone mets and if so do you have many side effects?? Am wary of taking it,but have been offered it today by my oncologist need advice from those who know
Posts.Title: denosomab for bone mets

Posts.Content: Hi can anyone tell me when the pain relief kicks in after 5 day course of r/t for spinal mets?? Finished course of this just over 4 weeks ago and still got pain lower back and hips
Posts.Title: radiotherapy for spine mets

Posts.Content: Please anyone who has or is taking this drug tell me your experience particularly side effects,have been adviced to take this by oncologist but don t feel i can reading about this drug on the web,it sounds like it will gratley effect quality of life simething that is very important to me
Posts.Title: desperate for advice re denosumab

Posts.Content: Thanks for replying,i too take femera (for past 6 weeks and apart from nausea havn t noticed much else.) I had inflammatory breast cancer dx nov 2007,chemo mastectomy all lymph nodes removed 10 out of 16 positive after surgery had radiotherapy,tamoxifen for 4 years and goserilin implants for past 18 months finished r/t for spinal mets 6 weeks ago which suddenly became very painful having had them for a year with no symptoms at all. Hence my reluctance to start yet another drug sometimes feel the treatments worse than the disease
Posts.Title: desperate for advice re denosumab

Posts.Content: Hi vicidin not licenced in uk,and am already taking volteral and lorazepam to ease muscle pains in hip/groin/thigh. Had apt with palliative care team tues assured by oncologist this is strictly for pain control NOT because as i put it to him gonna be in a box in 6 to 12 months! They have suggested eithe a tens machine,nerve pain drug(neither i nor my gp think its nerve pain) or horror of horrors morphine based pain control this feels like a huge deal to me and another step towards grim reaper,people who never get ill don t know how lucky they are and only those of us on this hidious journey can know how mentally and emotionaly hard it is to deal with. Don t think ive every felt so indecisive or scared in my life,hate it
Posts.Title: desperate for advice re denosumab

Posts.Content: Hi had r/t 5 weeks ago for spinal mets,now seem to have excruciating,hip/groin/thoracic muscle pain Have apt tomorrow with palliative pain control team hope tey ve got some gold star ideas
Posts.Title: Does anyone else suffer from severe muscle pains from spinal mets???????

Posts.Content: Hi Anyone else taking this drug? Have been on it for 1 month aching like hell thinking of stopping so fed up with all these chemicals,any advice welcome!
Posts.Title: femera/aching joints and muscles

Posts.Content: Hi Gayle Im totally with you on the quality of life issue as i said to my oncologist the treatments are worse than the disease at times. I had inflammatory breast cancer 4 years ago(aged 42) had chemo,mastectomy radiotherapy.Have had spinal mets for 15 months which became very painful in sept of this yr so had 5x radiotherapy.Have just started femera and also about to embark on monthly injections od denosumab for bones.God help our poor bodies with all these drugs!! Take care
Posts.Title: femera/aching joints and muscles

Posts.Content: Thanks for replying i didn t think anyone was going to it helps to know you stuck with it,but i agree all these so called helpful drugs come at a cost am seeing oncologist today so we l see what he has to say. Am just getting over 5 day course of radiotherapy to very painful spinal mets as well,so not sure of my symptoms have been after effects of this and/or femera. Thanks again for response Take care
Posts.Title: femera/aching joints and muscles
